name: Accurate-home-power-prediction
body:
### Teaser
As our homes become smarter, accurately predicting what the resident is doing can make our lives easier, cheaper and healthier.

### What
Using data from the[CASAS](http://casas.wsu.edu/) Project and machine learning techniques, this project accurately predicts what activity a person is engaged in based on sensor data.  The machine learning was done using [PyBrain](http://pybrain.org/)  with a feed-forward neural network.

[Video](https://youtu.be/EvIqcDkBsAM)
### Quick Facts
- ~12000 data points
- 8 Hidden Layer Neural Network

### Why
There are many exciting opportunities if a resident's activity can be accurately predicted.  One such application is predicting power usage.  This could allow for cost savings and power consumption reduction.
